landing.design_driven: Illuminating App Development with the Magic
landing.supercharge: We offer custom development that follows fast, reliable, and durable processes to ensure our clients can scale without technology hassle.
landing.supercharge_your: Supercharge your WordPress hosting with detailed website analytics, marketing tools.
landing.web_app_desc: We design and build digital products with leading technology.
landing.blockchain_nft_desc: We help you apply the latest blockchain technology to your business, such as blockchain platform development, NFT tokenization, payment solution,etc.
landing.design_marketing_desc: We created magnificent designs that transform the standard of your business across various online and offline platforms.
landing.service_for_you_desc: We want to be part or your success. From branding to product development, we provide all-in-one service for your success.
landing.system_development_desc: Architect robust and scalable backed solutions to offer the best experience, integrating and evolving existing systems, or building a custom solution from-scratch.
landing.web_mobile_development_desc: A cross-platform solution is important. We provide an amazing visual experience for your products across all platforms.
landing.blockchain_nft_solution_desc: We provide blockchain development services to deliver reliable blockchain systems which allow for enhanced traceability, security and faster processing of data and transactions.
landing.doubleda_means_desc: Domnossrai is specialist in software design and engineering, offering complete services to deliver delightful software solutions. We can help you transform an idea into a fully viable product, starting by defining the goals and building a roadmap to the best possible solution.

development.portfolio_desc: Check out what we can do

footer.enough_talk: Enough Talk, Let's Build Something Together.

id_1.title: DigiNFT
id_1.detail_desc: DigiNFT is the NFT marketplace app trading various NFT assets and providing NFT wallet, coin information

id_2.title: Hansmile Trading
id_2.detail_desc: Hansmile is Trading Agency and the system development focused on CRM and Notice Board. Marketing email system was integrated and individual customer supporting system was developed.

id_3.title: TopTravel Online Travel
id_3.sub_title: Online Travel information Booking and Planner
id_3.detail_desc:
Creating beautiful travel & tourism website design and portal development that really captures the spirit of travel, adventure and holiday. 

Main focus of this project is to build high-quality custom travel websites that have the latest technologies such as live booking confirmation, Travel Planner, App notification.

id_4.title: Yuanta Securities (Cambodia) Plc.
id_4.sub_title: The 1st fully-licensed securities firm in Cambodia and 1st Sole underwrite and lead manager.
id_4.detail_desc:
The Yuanta Securities provides brokerage, research and various advisory services such as IPO, Public bonds, M&A, Private dept financing. 

The service requires full-stack development starting from Website (frontend) to Operation System (backend) and also requires to develop a blog posting, marketing email system.

id_5.title: Alternative Intelligent Solution Ltd
id_5.sub_title: Wholesaler of electronic and telecommunications equipment and parts.
id_5.detail_desc: The Alternative Intelligent Solution Ltd is a private limited company located in UK and it’s main business activity is Wholesale of electronic and telecommunications equipment and parts.

id_6.title: Artbox 3d Museum
id_6.sub_title: Welcome to The World Best Trick Art Museum Art Box!
id_6.detail_desc:
3d Mapping project, designing 3d mapping for their main hole with size of 20m x 30m x 15m(h) and 4 displaying screen walls. 

For projection mapping, a technique is used that can convert any surface into a dynamic visual display. Though many ways can create the same effect but combining the 2D or 3D data with some computer animations can highlight the required features and diminish not such relevant things.

id_7.title: Dashi Restaurant
id_7.detail_desc:
Dashi restaurant is a very first modern Japanese restaurant. 

Interior design and construction were of major design importance.

id_8.title: Melo Restaurant
id_8.detail_desc:
MELO restaurant is a modern french restaurant located in heart of Phnom Penh City. 

Full packaged-branding service (from Interior design to Menu & Content Design).

id_9.title: Skyangkor Airlines
id_9.sub_title: The best and biggest Airlines operating in Cambodia
id_9.detail_desc:
The Skyangkor Airline is a leading market Airline company. 

The service requires full-stack development starting from Website (frontend) to Operation System (backend) and also requires to develop a Ticket Booking system, integrate with Payment gateway.

id_10.title: ECommerce Market APP
id_10.detail_desc: eCommerce App available for both B2C, C2C, customizable and adaptable for local market situation.

id_11.title: HR System
id_11.detail_desc: An HRMS, or human resources management system, is a suite of software applications used to manage human resources and related processes throughout the employee lifecycle.

id_12.title: ECommerce Partner
id_12.detail_desc: User-Friendly Admin Management System for eCommerce Partners. Able to control Order, Stock, Delivery, CRM, etc.

server.hero_desc: We make sure your website is fast, secure & always up so your visitors & search engines trust you.
server.hosting_desc: We provide hosting services for businesses of all sizes. Depends on spec required for your business, we recommend the most suitable hosting plan and guarantee the fast and secure hosting.

private_blockchain_network_desc: We help create private decentralized blockchain network that provide increased traceability and security of data and transactions.
smart_contract_desc_1: We provide the benefits of business automation to your business with smart contracts.
smart_contract_desc_2: Our smart contract platform enables you to use for following industries.
crypto_wallet_desc_1: As a premier cryptocurrency wallet development company, we develop customizable cryptocurrency wallets with advanced security features, multilingual support, and payment gateways for customers.
tokenization_nft_desc_1: Tokenization is the process of exchanging sensitive data for nonsensitive data called “tokens” that can be used in a database or internal system without bringing it into scope.
tokenization_nft_desc_2: We provide services and platform that allow clients to create, manage and trade their tokens (including NFT platforms).
blockchain_api_desc_1: Providing the API connection service for client's own system and platform syncing with major trading and chart library providers.
blockchain_api_desc_2: Binance, Coinbase, Tradingview, IG.com, Investing.com, etc
